name: Noorak (little light)
description:
Note: HTML5 version have some problems!!!

Controls: A & D for flying | space for 360 wave | use ingame joystick with your mouse left click for other waves

Noorak (Little Light)

Noorak is trapped in an underground world and must find his way out. You have to fly Noorak and pass through strange obstacles.

Noorak is a surreal game, a little hard, a little intellectual and a little challenging.

In this game, it is possible to customize the character and background, or you can play the game in black and white.

This game has 13 levels and about 15 minutes or more gameplay. This game is in development and more levels will be added soon.

=======================================================

Hello I am Ali Mohammad Alipour, the creator of this game, and this is my first game that I made all by myself.

This game is made with a computer that has onboard graphics. My computer can't even run Windows, but I was not disappointed and made the game with Linux Lite and Godot game engine.

This game is much bigger than what you see now and I cant finish it.

If you like this game lets make a group and finish this game together

Im very sorry my english is not good but dont worry you can contact me:

my email: alipouris1996@gmail.com
